statements: DELETE FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE beta > 1.5 AND standard_deviation < 0.5
DELETE FROM risk_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND sharpe_ratio > 2.0;
DELETE FROM Beta WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' AND beta < 1.5;
DELETE FROM Beta WHERE risk_metric_id = 10 AND company_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE evaluation_date < '2022-01-01' AND performance_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM RiskMetrics WHERE beta > 1.5 AND std_dev < 0.8;
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE return_rate > 10.0 AND variance < 5.0;
